text: Tomu, kto budet prepirat'sya s toboy otnositel'no 'Isy, posle togo kak ty poluchil [bozhestvennoye] znaniye, skazhi, [o Mukhammad]: "Davayte prizovem nashikh synov i vashikh synov, nashikh zhenshchin i vashikh zhenshchin, nas samikh i vas samikh, potom smirenno vozdenem v molitve ruki i prizovem proklyatiye Allakha na lzhetsov
